rows.label: qst104230_msg0001
rows.name:
Welcome to the Smaia Clinic.
Oh, it's you all from before!

rows.label: qst104230_msg0005
rows.name:
Unfortunately, Smaia-sensei
is absent again.

rows.label: qst104230_msg0008
rows.name: Is it urgent?

rows.label: qst104230_msg0009
rows.name: A school teacher? Smaia-sensei?

rows.label: qst104230_msg0010
rows.name:
In that case, it would be even
better to speak with her directly.

rows.label: qst104230_msg0101
rows.name:
Whether Smaia-sensei would
approve of teaching others...

rows.label: qst104230_msg0102
rows.name:
Even I am treated more like a handyman
than an apprentice, you see.

rows.label: qst104230_msg0201
rows.name:
Smaia-sensei agreed to
become a teacher!?

rows.label: qst104230_msg0202
rows.name:
I can't believe it...
That Sensei, teaching?

rows.label: qst104230_msg0203
rows.name: What will happen to this clinic...

rows.label: qst104230_msg0204
rows.name:
I'll consult with her when she
returns. ...Could this be my chance?

rows.label: qst104230_msg0301
rows.name: Ask Smaia to be a teacher?

rows.label: qst104230_msg0302
rows.name: Invite her

rows.label: qst104230_msg0303
rows.name: Think it over

rows.label: qst104230_msg0006
rows.name:
Smaia-sensei has gone to Iyasaki
Village in Liberalitas.

rows.label: qst104230_msg0007
rows.name:
Apparently, it's to get
medicinal ingredients from
Spirit Crucible Elpys.

rows.label: qst104230_msg0401
rows.name:
I don't know where in Spirit
Crucible Elpys she is, so you
will have to search for her...

rows.label: qst104230_msg0402
rows.name:
After that... If you're lucky,
she might accept your offer.

rows.label: qst104230_msg0501
rows.name:
It's uncertain whether Smaia-sensei
will accept, you see.

rows.label: qst104230_msg0502
rows.name:
It might be a waste of time, so it's
best to think it over carefully.

rows.label: qst104230_msg0601
rows.name:
When Smaia-sensei returns, I will
inform her that you came by.
